resources.string:
In Indonesia, we offer “LIMITED STAY VISA”, especially for expatriates. Here’s the requirements that you need to prepare:


1. Passport
Original passport with at least 6 (six) months of remaining validity and blank visa pages

2. Visa Application form
One completed visa application form download from each embassy’s official website. 

3. 1 (one) recent passport-size photograph in color.
Photograph must be in white background and taken with digital camera with high quality color and printed on quality paper.

4. A diplomatic or verbal note.
Diplomatic or verbal note issued by related region agencies confirming the person's diplomatic assignment or non-diplomatic assignment. For other nationals, a similar diplomatic note from the Embassy/ Consulates. In the case of diplomatic posting, the said verbal note should also stating whether the person replaces former staff member (full name) or a new position is being formed

5. Approval and Visa Recommendation Letter from Ministry of State Secretariat of the Republic of Indonesia

6. Full Vaccination Certificate (Certificate of vaccination with full dose (two doses, except Janssen, Pfizer) or booster.)

7. Hotel Booking Confirmation

8. Flight Ticket
